website_summaries.verdict: These budget-friendly slip-on sneakers deliver superior traction in contrast to similar footwear.
pros: Cushioned insoles help you stay balanced when you walk, run or play
Constructed from dual-vent mesh for fast, efficient drying
Equipped with synthetic suede for unmatched durability and strength
cons: May be too narrow for some men

customer_reviews.title: Fit well.
customer_reviews.text: About as expected for size 14. l'm a tall man and weigh 240 lbs so the insoles were a little lightweight for me, but one insert solved the problem. For just around the house and yard, they are just fine and are holding up to repeated washing. Just keep in mind, these are not work boots and I wouldn't be jumping on any shovels with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Light and Airy
customer_reviews.text: Fits and feels better than expected...reasonably priced, and yes it is very light and airy, you can feel the breeze, very satisfied with the product..not low your quality foreign made product..affordable and comfortable for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: csp

customer_reviews.title: Not for guys with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good overall, but they're just a little too narrow at the front for my feet (which, to be fair, are fairly wide) to be comfortable. IMO that's on me for not double-checking on that before I bought them, though; it's not a knock on the shoes themselves. For someone with regular-width feet, I'm sure they'd fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to sandals for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as an alternative to sandals for warm weather. They slip on very easily and they have some stretch to the upper to aid this. They are very lightweight and have excellent ‘breathability’. I feel these will be good for walking in the summer when wearing sandals is not indicated or appropriate. The only thing I wish was different was, I wish I had picked a different color...the creamy yellow is a little gross and blaring, but maybe I can get them dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: I like the first pair so much that when it came time to replace them I bought a second pair. They held up well and I had then so long I wore through the insert. My only complaint is when the soles wore smooth on the heals they would slip on wet tile floors. Not all tiles floors. I have had other shoes do this but these seem to do it more often. Might be something in the rubber or maybe I just kept them longer than I should have. Anyway, for the cost I'll just replace them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good value item!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? Super light, good looking, comfortable enough to wear every day when it’s dry out, removable inserts. Great for a quick throw on or if you can’t bend down to tie your shoes this will work great (post operation experience). I actually bought two pairs. Wear with our without socks. If you tend to rock the sock, maybe go up a half size. Can be a little stuffy depending on sock thickness.
customer_reviews.author: DStarrVox

customer_reviews.title: A fine substitute
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my preferred brand was out of blue and grey shoes. I generally like these breathable slip on shoes for my day to day. I can make my usual brand last about a year with frequent washes...I'm curious how long these will last. Update: I got a half size larger and they are super small and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Evan Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: Seem like good quality shoes. Bought these for my husband for Christmas and can't wait to guve them to him. He wanted something he could easssissly slip on and off when he goes to the basement or does home visits as a youth pastor. Tried them on myself and compared them to shoes he already owns and they seem like the right size. Can't wait to give them to him!
customer_reviews.author: Beyond blessed

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very lightweight. Soft and flexible with a cushion sole. The space between the molded pressure pads on the sole tend to pick up many small stones between the pads due to the depth of the dividers. These will mark floors and sound like you are tap dancing. They easily get wet as the instep covering is porous. However they would make this shoe useful while boating. Slip resistance has not been tested by me on a boat or wet surface so be advised.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Dunkley

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and way to wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband is enjoying is shoes very much . They are comfortable and way to wear . The price was perfect . We bought them by mistake but we decided to keep them ..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and kids

customer_reviews.title: comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He asked my to find him a pair that were slip-on, a good tread on sole and light weight. I ran across these on Amazon and ordered them. I is very happy about the shoes. Fast shipment
customer_reviews.author: L. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: I Like Them
customer_reviews.text: Its really hard for me to find any kind of comfortable shoe on all let alone on the internet , But these fit perfect right out of the box and I just love wearing them around the house and property, I wear the every day and have ordered another pair just to have when these wear out !!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable I wear them everywhere they’re like wearing slippers all the time. My feet love them. I have bought them before and will buy them again. They are also very durable I walked in them in the snow hot sidewalks with no discomfort or Signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Beach Native

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a  nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received these from the Prime day sale. they seem like a nice pair of shoes. I can see where some people would want a thicker inner sole. I'm probably going to get a set this weekend just to make the sole a little "cushier". So far, I'd say they're a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Never enough inventory, but great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes. He wanted another pair, but they are no longer in stock. This has happened a couple of times with other similar shoes. Don't know why you can't get them anymore. Inventory not kept up very well or they have been discontinued. Good luck getting a size you need. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I have had three back surgeries which prevents me from tying my shoe. These shoes make it easy and look good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bence

customer_reviews.title: it feels like you are walking on the pavement with your socks
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, cheap made,it feels like you are walking on the pavement with your socks on
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on buying inexpensive shoes online. I needed something just to throw on to walk my dogs. These shoes are unbelievably comfortable. Not sure how long they'll last but for this price its a total win win.
customer_reviews.author: Jneg

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 94 year old Dad. He loves them, light weight and skid resistant. And, he looks good with his normal dress in these shoes looks much better than regular tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: vaughn honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: NewDenBer Slip On Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Recently had back surgery and unable to bend down to put on tie shoes. These slip ons are perfect for my needs. They are well made and comfortable. I wear size 12 and these are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of shoes for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a pair of shoes to wear for his daily exercise. He did not want to wear “good” shoes for that purpose. So the price I paid for this pair of shoes was right. The shoes seemed light and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Objectively

customer_reviews.title: looked nice but...
customer_reviews.text: They did look good and seemed like a good shoe but they were too small. ordered 1/2 size larger for easy slip on but they came smaller than expected, Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as slippers/house shoes. I bought my regular shoe size and they were tight. A return for a size up, and I am very pleased. Best house shoes I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Francis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and wears extremely well. Bought 2 more pair In different colors.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sole padding would collapse quixkly at this price point. They have held up way better than much expensive shoes Inhave had. They get worn daily for outdoor and garage work.
customer_reviews.author: gcase

customer_reviews.title: Shoe looked good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the size listed and on the shoe was incorrect-too small...had to be returned-the first Amazon item I ever returned. It was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but check the size
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, and they are well made. Sizes, however, are not consistent. I ordered size 11 for both, ordered 2 months apart, and the newest one is significantly smaller. Still wearable, but noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NDB Sport Men's Casual Lightweight Slip-on Sneaker...
customer_reviews.text: These 13 size shoes were a gift for my son in another state. Too bad they don't have half sizes. Some offers have limited sizes anyway. He didn't want a half size larger. He just received them so it might be awhile to update review.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Wears them all the time
customer_reviews.text: He loves them. Very comfortable. I got them for him to wear around the house but he wears them out also. I went back and got the black but they fit tighter; hopefully, they will stretch a little.
customer_reviews.author: sharon stiverson

customer_reviews.title: This is an item made in China.  Seldom can you trust their shoe sizes to be correct.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 D shoe. I ordered an 8 and the size was too small. I guess I should have known since it was made in China, the shoe sizes are not accurate. Amazon was kind to accept my return of this item, but I was not comfortable in re-ordering this shoe again. Fox
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in beige. The shoe is well made and comfortable, but the color is a bit "golden" looking instead of a true beige.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable as my Sketchers at a fraction of the cost. I can tell they may not last as long but not nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bsharpark

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I paid 5$ more and got triple the quality. I would have paid 5$ in China for these same shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slip on
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves these shoes but they do run a bit small. He wears them to school and they have held up. They are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: shafur

customer_reviews.title: My 17-year old son loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Just like sneakers but you never have to stop and tie your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: They are not as sturdy as a real sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off They make squeeky noises at times. Should be available in wide size
customer_reviews.author: Roy E Sims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good loafer, wore it all around the house and work.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Houston

customer_reviews.title: slip on walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were just the shoe I wanted fit great and came in a trimly mater.
customer_reviews.author: john troka

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very low quality. Wear down and fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 13. 5 B and ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13.5 B and ordered a 145 W. They did not fit. My toes hit the end and it cramped the sides. They are not the size that they said..
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoes great for airplane trips but who fly's any more?
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are now my favorite footwear: size correctly, light, easy to slip on and off and best of all they are contemporary, stylish and light.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelius

customer_reviews.title: Feel great on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure at first if id like them, but now i love them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very good value compared to the competition. The fit was very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: THE VOLFER

customer_reviews.title: Fit runs a little on the small size.
customer_reviews.text: Fit runs a little on the small size. I buy 1 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: ShopAllNight

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: This id the second pair of these I have gotten and they are great and the price is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: J Morris

customer_reviews.title: The fit is as expected & so is the style.
customer_reviews.text: Casual shoe with a touch of class. Very comfortable. Will buy again but in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: light and comfy, but about 1.5 sizes too large. I had to return the original size I've bought for my son and get 1.5 sizes smaller
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super light and comfy. Hold up pretty good to daily use ( have had about a month or so). For the price you can’t beat them. Already ordered a second pair in gray. Look good with jeans and shorts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good product. With a flaw.
customer_reviews.text: When I step into shoes the area around heal collapsed. So I took shoe off to straighten and then after struggle I was able to get them on. The inside of heal was not stitched securely to outside. I had another brand that did the same thing and was able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable slip on shoe. Feels good on my feet while walking.
customer_reviews.author: WirenutBull

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sole design.
customer_reviews.text: The soles collect rocks like crazy and they make an awful squeezing noise on hard shiny floors. Otherwise ok but won't be wearing them as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tony R Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight slip-on, correct sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother. He loves them. Lightweight and he needed slip on shoes since his stroke. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off and light
customer_reviews.text: 1 shoes a little tight but iv wore them and they have become my favorite shoe comfortable and light easy on off i like um
customer_reviews.author: JayC

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and make school morning easy and hassle free
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shoe for my son. With only a few weeks left in the school year I wanted some affordable that would last until June. I got more than that. He loves them! They are comfortable and make school morning easy and hassle free. Excellent value for the money. That being said I should buy another pair before the prices go up👍
customer_reviews.author: Jaylen's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the first pair, so I purchased a second pair. Will probably by more. It's light weight and comfortable and fits well. I have bad hips and they are 10 times better then shoes I was waring.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. McPike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comes to an abrupt point - don't know anyone with pointed feet.
customer_reviews.author: ultraorg

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. Inexpensive and comfortable. Easy to slip on. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfectly sized
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with this pair of shoes. He finds them comfortable for wearing around the house or for shopping. There is plenty of toe room for his tender tootsies. His foot is a size 15 and average width and they are sized perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find 11. 5 shoes anywhere. Bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find 11.5 shoes anywhere. Bought size 12 and added orthotic insert and still too large.
customer_reviews.author: RWQ

customer_reviews.title: great comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: good shoes, great comfort and fit. easy on/off. good traction, soft rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Neilson L.

customer_reviews.title: Light, breathable, comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light. I walk my dogs while wearing them at a pretty fast pace, and the shoes have stayed snug. I've had them for a week now and have abt 15 miles on them. Holding form, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Crtstr1

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but what is my normal size was off by 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Order a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I often can't find a size 14 in stores so I ordered these online and the fit was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Haunyak

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good, short.
customer_reviews.text: Evan though they feel good on, they seem to be a little short.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Trantham

customer_reviews.title: ... some one came up with a show that is comfortable and made in a mend size 15
customer_reviews.text: It is about time some one came up with a shoe that is comfortable and made in a mens size 15.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable slip ons
customer_reviews.text: My husband finds these sneakers very comfortable. The only problem is they do not hold up as long as we think they should, the material wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that good of shoe
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is not what I was expecting. Looks like poor quality control. Glue that is seen holding the sole and top material is sloppy. Will use them for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the only way to shop now!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, lightweight, size is perfect. I ordered 2 pair, loved them, so I ordered 2 more pair. We can't find this size anywhere, Shelves are empty at stores. Amazon is the only way to buy things now.
customer_reviews.author: karen neatherlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I ordered two more pair, different colors. Very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid white bottom shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I wear them inside the house only.
customer_reviews.author: bluesman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have several pairs different colors. I will buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and soft
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and soft, easy to wear. But ran small and look and feels cheap, but they are inexpensive if bought on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use it for every day use. Very comfortable. Also light weight. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Shimote

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable! been using them everyday. They are quiet durable too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family member. So comfortable and fit great. He is so pleased and has recommended them to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feel are great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have purchased these shoes. I bought 3 different colors this time. They all fit great. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rich

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They fit but I don't think it has much for support.
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrow across the base of the toes, not much arch support, but still fairly comfortable. Good shoe-sandal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: I have a hard time finding my size in slip ons and these are great..
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe, very light and comfortable. Waiting for them to have the gray in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Dellaro  USMC

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Sole came off in two months with limited use. Contacted seller directly and received a replacement pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson G. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, but too big!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a summer shoe and it would be good for driving or at the beach or lake but not in cities or sidewalks due to the large size of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Florence B. Libby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SHOE THIS IS THE SECOND PAIR I HAVE GOTTEN FOR MY HUSBAND AND HE LOVES THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tate

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, quick to put on. Perfect for when youre just running out rq
customer_reviews.author: Dyer Rose

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect and were easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: This was apair of shoes and was not in a box.The toes were sorta mashed in,but looked ok once they were on .
customer_reviews.author: pat nixon

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and very comfortable. Can use them as house slippers or out in public. Easy to slip on. Very surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very lite and still supportive.
customer_reviews.text: They ended up costing more than I expected but I didn't have to wait long for them and they fit and look great.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for workouts at the club
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great and fit very well. Would purchase again when needed

customer_reviews.title: Great value 👍.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and cool for hot summer heat, very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Too small and narrow. Possibly 1 size up may work soles squeek on the floor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son just can put his shoes on faster in the morning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Product has a great look. The shoes are extremely lightweight and comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: OK shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're OK shoes, you can tell they're not a name brand.

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and he LOVES them. They fit perfect and are so comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome service and shoes are very comfort would order again

product_meta.title: NewDenBer Sport Men's Casual Lightweight Slip-On Walking Shoe Sneakers
product_meta.description:
1.NDB mens slip on sneakers is the sneakers that you will like. These men's slip on is a New Style Functional hybrid-style shoes optimized for running and other daily activities.
The breathable Mesh Fabric with Flex Groove EVA MD Sole makes these mens sneakers incredible comfortable and breathable . 
The Flex Groove EVA Cushioned Sole make sure the sole is easy to bent, curled, and provides durable traction and cushionin. 
It is a good option as running shoes, fashion sneakers, slip on tennis shoes, slip on walking shoes, athletic shoes, gmy shoes, indoor outdoor shoes and suitable for any daily activities. 

2.Size Introduction: You can choose your daily US size. It will be OK for you.

3.Features: 
-Comfort & Non-Slip:
3D Designed Imported Mesh Fabric, Dual vent mesh structure offers incredible comfortable and quick drying properties. Dual vent mesh construction for dynamic mobility. Perfect accord with human body engineering Keep Your Feet Feel Great!

-Excellent Traction & Cushioning : 
Flex Groove EVA MD Sole provides excellent traction and stability for all surfaces and terrains. Multi-directional flexible groove and cushioned insole for balance even during waterside activities.

-LIGHTWEIGHT & EASY-ON CLOSURE:
One-Shoe Weight Only 205g (0.45lb/Size 8D) Very Flexible. Light Weight and Soft.

-Fit for Spring,Summer,Fall and Winter
A good pair of comfort Running Shoes, fashion sneakers, tennis shoes, walking shoes, sports shoes and suitable for any daily activities. 

-Great Durability & HIGH QUALITY : 
High-quality synthetic skin suede increases durability 15 Days 100% Return Guarantee

-Low-Top, Mesh Fabric and MD Sole Lace Up Style. Limited Stock NEW Fashion Style
feature_bullets: ★COMFORTABLE: 3D Designed Mesh Fabric, Dual vent mesh structure offers incredible comfortble and quick drying properties. Dual vent mesh construction for dynamic mobility. Perfect accord with human body engineering Keep Your Feet Feel Great!

★Excellent Traction & Cushioning :The Flex Groove EVA MD Sole provides excellent traction and stability for all surfaces and terrains. Flexible cushioned insole for balance even during waterside activities. Also make sure the running shoes is easy to bent and curled.
★Great Durability & High Quality: The high-quality mesh fabric upper with synthetic suede increases durability. Flex Groove EVA MD Sole provides durable traction and cushioning.

★ALL-PURPOSE & EASY MAINTENANCE: Easy Slip On style make these mens slip on sneakers to be a good option as slip on sneakers, slip on tennis shoes, slip on walking shoes, athletic shoes, gmy shoes, indoor outdoor shoes and suitable for any daily activities. Moreover; the sockliner which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic. They are easy to clean. Rinsing the running shoes with clean water.

★SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: With NDB, you're taking no risk with your purchase. We offer a 100% no risk money-back guarantee if you're not thrilled with your purchase for any reason. Just tell us and we will do our best to give you the most satisfactory solution.
